relocation_scenarios.question: There is an ongoing armed conflict in my country, and I'm considering fleeing abroad right away. Should I move?
Hyper‑inflation is wiping out my savings, and a friend says jobs pay more overseas. Should I move abroad immediately?
I face violent discrimination for my identity at home. Should I relocate abroad as soon as possible?
I've heard the cost of living is much lower in Portugal and quality of life is better. Should I pack up and move there now?
A company overseas offered me a high‑paying job in a shortage field. Should I relocate immediately?
My partner already lives abroad and wants me to join them right away. Should I move?
I need surgery that's cheaper overseas. Should I move abroad quickly for better healthcare?
I want my children to attend a top international school abroad. Should we move this month?
Rising sea levels threaten my hometown in a decade. Should I move overseas now?
As a remote worker, I could live cheaply in Bali and save money. Should I relocate immediately?
My pension will stretch further in Mexico. Should I move abroad to retire right now?
I crave adventure and new experiences. Should I sell everything and move abroad?
A low‑tax jurisdiction in the Caribbean sounds appealing. Should I relocate my life there now?
I'm frustrated with domestic politics. Should I emigrate abroad as soon as possible?
Housing prices here are unaffordable. Should I move to a cheaper country right away?
My spouse got an overseas work posting for two years. Should I relocate immediately to accompany them?
I prefer warm weather year‑round. Should I move abroad to a tropical country now?
I want to immerse myself in a new language. Should I relocate abroad next month?
I feel stuck and want a clean slate. Should I randomly pick a country and move there?
I've always dreamed of traveling the world. Should I quit my job and move abroad tomorrow?
